89398.text:
- deps: Update to Golang 1.13.9
- build: Remove kube-cross image building
89398.markdown:
- deps: Update to Golang 1.13.9
  - build: Remove kube-cross image building ([#89398](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/89398), [@justaugustus](https://github.com/justaugustus)) [SIG Release and Testing]
89398.author: justaugustus

89537.text: kubeadm: fix a bug where post upgrade to 1.18.x, nodes cannot join the cluster due to missing RBAC
89537.markdown: Kubeadm: fix a bug where post upgrade to 1.18.x, nodes cannot join the cluster due to missing RBAC ([#89537](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/89537), [@neolit123](https://github.com/neolit123)) [SIG Cluster Lifecycle]
89537.author: neolit123

89540.text:
In the kubelet resource metrics endpoint at /metrics/resource, change the names of the following metrics:
- node_cpu_usage_seconds --> node_cpu_usage_seconds_total
- container_cpu_usage_seconds --> container_cpu_usage_seconds_total
This is a partial revert of #86282, which was added in 1.18.0, and initially removed the _total suffix
89540.markdown:
In the kubelet resource metrics endpoint at /metrics/resource, change the names of the following metrics:
  - node_cpu_usage_seconds --> node_cpu_usage_seconds_total
  - container_cpu_usage_seconds --> container_cpu_usage_seconds_total
  This is a partial revert of #86282, which was added in 1.18.0, and initially removed the _total suffix ([#89540](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/89540), [@dashpole](https://github.com/dashpole)) [SIG Instrumentation and Node]
89540.author: dashpole

89602.text: kubeadm: during join when a check is performed that a Node with the same name already exists in the cluster, make sure the NodeReady condition is properly validated
89602.markdown: Kubeadm: during join when a check is performed that a Node with the same name already exists in the cluster, make sure the NodeReady condition is properly validated ([#89602](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/89602), [@kvaps](https://github.com/kvaps)) [SIG Cluster Lifecycle]
